title: Three Guys Named Mike
description: When small town girl Marcy Lewis (Wyman) becomes an airline stewardess, she finds herself the object of assorted romeos, all named Mike. She has to choose between science student and bartender Mike Lawrence (Johnson), crafty ad executive Mike Tracy (Sullivan), and handsome airline pilot Mike Jamison (Keel). As Marcy becomes more self-confident in her job and herself, her ideas about the type of men she likes also changes which makes it all the more difficult to choose which Mike she will choose in the end. Pleasing comedy scripted by Sheldon Leonard.
